start_scene.scene: *steps into the office on the first day, feeling a mix of excitement and nervousness*

guide_greeting.scene: Welcome to the AI assessment headquarters! I'm your trusty guide through the world of responsible AI. Ready for the ride?

guide_encouragement.scene: No worries, my friend! We're here to make sense of it all. Take a look around this bustling office dedicated to evaluating AI technologies...

choices.option: Nod and look around the office

you_response1.scene: It's quite a responsibility, isn't it?

guide_explanation.scene: It sure is! But fear not, we've got your back. This office is brimming with innovation, ideas, and even a touch of controversy...

you_response2.scene: That sounds like quite the challenge.

guide_reassurance.scene: Indeed, it won't be a walk in the park. But remember, you're the ultimate decision maker here. Your assessments will determine the fate of these technologies...

choices.option: Express concern about the potential impact

you_response3.scene: I'll do my best to ensure responsible AI prevails.

guide_cheer.scene: That's the spirit! So, strap yourself in, take a deep breath, and get ready to embark on this thrilling journey of AI assessment. The future awaits, and you're at the helm.

choices.option: Take a deep breath and nod
